response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection, and given its quality, it's worth more than $100. Considering its true value, I am offering it to you for $120. This is an opportunity to get a high-quality item at a price that's slightly above its perceived value by you, ensuring both of us benefit. Please let me know if this offer suits your expectations.", "product_price": 120}
